author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the gammon into a saucepan. Cover with water and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for ten minutes, or until the gammon is completely cooked through. In a bowl, mix together the onion, peas, orange segments, mint and oil. Place the salad on a serving plate. Cut the gammon into strips and scatter over the salad.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz gammon steak,  ¼ onion, sliced,  150g/5oz fresh peas,  1 orange, segmented,  2 tbsp chopped fresh mint,  1 tbsp oil
